lyrics:
If I had the chance to make love to you again
I'd hold you in my arms, and I'd never let it end.

I'm feeling so afraid, our love I have betrayed
Alone I cried and thought about the big mistake I've made
I wish I could explain, I'm the only one to blame.
I've hurt enough for both of us, and time will ease the pain.

And how I regret that day, and now that you've gone away
I'll give anythig to bring you back home to me.
If I had the chance to make love to you again
I'd hold you in my arms, and I'd never let it end.
If I had the chance just to be with you once more
I'd give you kind of love that you've never had before.

I've learned my lesson well
My life's an empty shell
Without you, without you there's no story left to tell.
I believe (I believe)
You and me can find the love we had
And you'll see that we can make it better
Cause together we were once so strong
But now you've moved on

And how I regret that day, and now that you've gone away
I'll give anythig to bring you back home to me.
If I had the chance to make love to you again
I'd hold you in my arms, and I'd never let it end.
If I had the chance just to be with you once more
I'd give you kind of love that you've never had before.
